resources.string: This app is for the use of adults in the Province of Ontario, Canada. Lottery and charitable gaming products are only available to those persons 18 years of age and over, while casinos and slot facilities in Ontario are restricted to those persons 19 years of age and over.
1. Minimum Amount in your account should be $5.
2. Select six numbers from 1 to 50 on game panel.
3. You will get $100000 if your picked number is similar to winning number.
4. The amount will be added in your wallet amount.
Question 1. How can i add money?
You can add money to click on Add Money Button on Home Screen.
Question 2. How can i get winning price?
Your winning price is automatically added in your wallet.
Question 3. How many numbers i can select for buy a ticket?
You can select any 6 numbers in a single ticket.
Question 4. When i will get the result of my ticket?
You will get the result immediately.
You can purchase ticket any time. There are no restrictions at all.
You can buy ticket with the cost of $5.
You can buy ticket with a simple steps.
Money will be credit in your account immediately.
